<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><CatalogEntry xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir"><id value="3d96b8e5-4442-4a80-b30e-82be1dcbee7c"/><meta><versionId value="1"/><lastUpdated value="2022-02-17T17:34:52.004+08:00"/><tag><system value="http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason"/><code value="HTEST"/><display value="test health data"/></tag></meta><identifier><system value="http://example.com/identifier"/><value value="123"/></identifier><type><text value="Medication"/></type><orderable value="true"/><referencedItem><reference value="Medication/123"/></referencedItem></CatalogEntry>

Bad-Request-Response.value:
<OperationOutcome xmlns='http://hl7.org/fhir'>
<issue>
    <severity value='error'/>
    <code value='exception'/>
    <diagnostics value='validation error, path `resourceType` is required'/>
</issue>
</OperationOutcome>
